title: Oz to Rally With Trump in Pennsylvania on Saturday
description: Former President Donald J. Trump’s support pulled Dr. Mehmet Oz across the finish line in the Republican primary, but Dr. Oz has kept Mr. Trump largely at arm’s length in the general election.
dc:creator: Trip Gabriel
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: In recent appearances, Dr. Mehmet Oz, Pennsylvania’s Republican Senate nominee, has barely uttered the name “Trump.”
